statements: SELECT * FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT username, age FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE location = 'New York' OR location = 'California';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE interests LIKE '%sports%';
SELECT user_id, email, gender FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT username, email, age, location FROM users WHERE location LIKE 'New%' AND interests LIKE '%Programming%';
SELECT user_id, gender, location FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND gender IN ('Male', 'Female') ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE interests IS NOT NULL AND (gender = 'Male' OR age > 30) ORDER BY age DESC, username ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY preference_id DESC;
SELECT email, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, preference_id, preference_value FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_value <> 'default';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id > 5 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, preference_id, preference_value FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY preference_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT u.username, p.preference_id, p.preference_value FROM users u JOIN user_preferences p ON u.user_id = p.user_id WHERE u.user_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT username, email, age FROM users ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, count(interest_id) AS num_interests FROM user_interests GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_interests > 3;
SELECT user_id, recommendation_text, recommendation_date FROM content_recommendations WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, age, gender FROM users WHERE age > 25 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT u.username, u.location, r.recommendation_text FROM users u JOIN content_recommendations r ON u.user_id = r.user_id;
SELECT u.username, u.age, i.interest_id FROM users u JOIN user_interests i ON u.user_id = i.user_id WHERE u.age < 30 ORDER BY u.age ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email, age FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT user_id, email, created_at FROM users WHERE age >= 25 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT username, email, location FROM users JOIN user_profiles ON users.user_id = user_profiles.user_id WHERE user_profiles.location = 'New York';
SELECT user_id, category, ranking FROM user_preferences WHERE ranking > 3 ORDER BY category, ranking DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, username, email, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT u.username, up.full_name, up.location, up.bio FROM users u JOIN user_profiles up ON u.user_id = up.user_id;
SELECT up.location, up.bio, u.username, ui.interaction_type FROM user_profiles up LEFT JOIN users u ON up.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN user_interactions ui ON u.user_id = ui.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, gender FROM users ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM content WHERE category = 'Technology' AND publish_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, content_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions INNER JOIN users ON user_interactions.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age < 25;
SELECT content_id, title, category FROM content WHERE publish_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT u.username, p.category, p.interest_level FROM users u JOIN user_preferences p ON u.user_id = p.user_id;
SELECT r.user_id, c.title, r.score FROM recommendations r JOIN content c ON r.content_id = c.content_id WHERE r.score > 0.8 ORDER BY r.score DESC;
